title: Royal Escape in Jaipur's Most Opulent Hotel
description: Known for its warm welcome and quintessential Indian hospitality, the famed pink city of Jaipur is a blend of traditional Rajput ethos and modern living. Paying tribute to this juxtaposition is the opulent Fairmont Jaipur, with splashes of Mughal and Rajputana culture across its impressive spaces. Be treated to a royal experience and enjoy daily buffet breakfast, three-course or buffet dinners according to your package during your stay, a drink each night per person, complimentary Wi-Fi together with a 25% discount on food and drinks and spa treatments.
offer_address: 2 Riico, Kukas, Rajasthan 302028, India

title: Opulent Jaipur Palace Escape with Decadent Dining
description:
Experience the life of Rajasthani royalty at Samode Palace, a 475-year-old palace turned luxury hotel, less than five hours' drive from Delhi. Cradled by the stunning Aravalli Range, this magical palace boasts a beautiful fusion of Rajasthani and Mughal architecture, frescoed interiors and a marble and mosaic swimming pool. A residence fit for royalty, this heritage hotel has played host to many celebrities (Kendall Jenner shot the 10-year anniversary cover for Vogue India here) and is an Instagrammer's dream.

This unforgettable escape includes daily breakfast, a lavish dinner once per stay, a bottle of wine on arrival and 20% discount on spa treatments, food and soft drinks.

**Travelling with family?** Packages are valid for two adults and two children (aged 10 years and under), sleeping in existing bedding.
offer_address: Village Samode, Tehsil Chomu, Jaipur, Rajasthan 303806

title: Heritage Stay in Royal Jaipur with Decadent Dining & Drinks
description:
Experience true royal living at the magnificent Alsisar Haveli, a stunning mansion hotel belonging to the regal Alsisar family of Rajasthan. Tucked away just outside Jaipur city centre and less than five hours from Delhi, this 45-room heritage hotel will welcome you with traditional Rajput architecture, including sprawling courtyards, stunningly painted walls and ceilings, a swimming pool and spa. Perfect for a weekend break or a city staycation, Alsisar Haveli promises to enhance your Rajasthan experience.

**Your handpicked inclusions**: 

- Enjoy lavish daily breakfast featuring Indian classics such as idli-sambar, aloo paratha and poha
- Indulge in one three-course dinner for two once during your stay
- Relax with one glass of wine or beer per person once during the stay (one drink per person)
- Treat yourself to additional food, drinks or a relaxing spa treatment with a 20% discount at the restaurant, bar and spa
- Stay connected with complimentary Wi-Fi

**Travelling with family?** One child (aged five years and under) stays free on existing bedding with breakfast included.
offer_address: Sansar Chandra Rd, Shri Ram Colony, Sindhi Camp, Jaipur, Rajasthan 302001

title: Jaipur Five-Star Oberoi Escape with Daily Breakfast & Daily Drinks
description:
Step out of everyday life and into The Oberoi Rajvilas, Jaipur, a five-star haven of luxury in the renowned 'Pink City' of Jaipur. Complete with the allure of the Maharajas' era, the property boasts beautiful gardens, magnificent buildings, flaming mashaal lamps, and tranquil reflecting ponds, scattered across a magnificent 129,499sqm. Located just a half-hour drive from Jaipur International Airport and five hours from Delhi, the Oberoi is known for its legendary hospitality, with a multi-cuisine restaurant, yoga and meditation in a serene setting, spa treatments offered by outstanding therapists, and delightful temperature-controlled pool with elephant fountains.

It's little wonder that the establishment is so highly awarded, receiving the Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice Awards 2022 (Top 25 Luxury Hotels in India), placing second in the Top India Hotel Resorts of the Travel + Leisure USA Worldâ€™s Best Awards, and many more. It's time for a Rajasthani-style Oberoi sojourn at this haven of tranquility in Jaipur.
offer_address: Babaji Ka Modh, Goner Rd, Prem Nagar, Jaipur, Rajasthan 302031, India

title: Top-Rated Boutique Jaipur Suites with Daily Breakfast & Decadent Dining
description:
Live like nobility at the stunning Royal Heritage Haveli in Jaipur, a former hunting lodge turned stylish boutique hotel. Situated less than five hours from Delhi, this regal paradise is stamped with a Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice 2021 badge and ranks among the top 10% of hotels worldwide on the review site.

Offering a collection of suites, this 300-year-old hotel is perfect for those looking for a luxurious escape. With every suite featuring magnificent arches, handpainted interiors and indulgent amenities, this is no ordinary hotel. A stunning kaleidoscope of everything inherently Jaipur, Royal Heritage Haveli is the perfect way to discover the Pink City and its many charms. Whether you are a couple looking for an intimate romantic escape or a family stay, Jaipur's magnificent palaces, hilltop forts and temples are sure to delight.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Enjoy a non-alcoholic welcome drink each
- Kickstart your day in Jaipur with daily set-menu breakfast at Kigelia Court
- Experience a romantic night with a chef's special, set-menu candlelit dinner at Kigelia Court, once per stay
- Indulge with a 10% discount on drinks and dining
- Unwind with a 15% discount on spa treatments
- Stay connected with complimentary Wi-Fi

**Travelling with family?** One child (10 years and under) stay free on existing bedding with all inclusions as per package purchased.

**Longer stay bonus:** Stay 4+ nights in an upgraded Premium or Signature Suite and enjoy two set-menu dinners during your stay.

**Signature Suite Upgrade bonus:** Stay in the lavish Signature Suite and enjoy a champagne breakfast once during your stay, along with hot tea or coffee with cookies in the evening.
offer_address: Plot No. 116 & 117, Near Khatipura Tiraya, Khatipura, Jaipur, Rajasthan 302012

description: Escape the bustling city with a romantic boutique hotel stay at Tree of Life, Jaipur, just 30 minutes from Jaipur city centre. title: Jaipur Opulent Five-Star Spa Villa Luxury with Daily Breakfast, Daily Dinner & INR1,000 Spa Credit
description:
Just 45 minutes from the urban buzz of Jaipur is Tree of Life Resort & Spa, a collection of 13 luxury villas scattered across seven acres of lush greenery. Set to the backdrop of the magnificent Aravalli Range of Rajasthan, this lavish resort promises ultimate luxury with its infinity pool and well-appointed villas. Winner of the Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice Award 2021, it is simply perfect for a romantic escape or a laidback family vacation.

Spend your days exploring the 'Pink City' of Jaipur, with its historical forts, colourful palaces and buzzing markets, or make the most of the serenity in your private villa, complete with a couple's spa and outdoor shower.
location_description: The Tree of Life Resort & Spa
offer_address: Kacherwala, Kukas, Rajasthan 302028

description: Forget itineraries, schedules and time: fill your days with pure luxury and relaxation, staying at the dreamy Anopura Resort, located on the hills surrounding Rajasthanâ€™s capital Jaipur. Spend two nights in this forgotten corner of the world, with meals included and a nightly cocktail per person.

The property has many awards to its name, including a TripAdvisor Travellers' Choice Award 2021, placing it within the top 10% of properties worldwide. Perfect for a weekend break or a city staycation, Alsisar Haveli promises to enhance your Rajasthan experience.

title: Heritage Palace Stay in the Heart of Jaipur's Pink City with Daily Breakfast
description: Hidden right in the heart of Jaipur's Pink City, Narain Niwas Palace is a modern-day heritage hotel that has been meticulously converted into a luxe hotel that reflects the palaceâ€™s original majesty and charm. Built-in 1928 by one of Rajasthan's aristocratic families as a royal retreat, this palatial will give you a taste of the royal life with its stained glass windows, ornate chandeliers and outdoor swimming pool, where peacocks can be seen roaming the manicured grounds. Just a 20-minute drive from Jaipur Airport and a 5.5-hour drive from Delhi, Narain Niwas Palace is a relaxing antidote to the bustling city, and yet within easy access of the city's major attractions, including the honeycombed Hawa Mahal.
offer_address: Hotel Narain Niwas Palace Kanota Bagh, Narayan Singh Rd, Jaipur, Rajasthan 302004

description:
Just 45 minutes away from the urban buzz of Jaipur is the Tree of Life Resort & Spa, a collection of 13 luxury villas scattered across seven acres of lush greenery. Nestled amid the magnificent Aravalli Range of Rajasthan, this lavish resort promises ultimate luxury with its infinity pool and well-appointed villas. Simply perfect for a romantic escape or a family vacation.

title: Royal Heritage Palace Stay in the Heart of Jaipur with Daily Breakfast & Daily Drinks
description:
Diggi Palace in the heart of Jaipur is a lavish property that opened its doors in 1991 as a heritage hotel and has more than 150 years of history.

Here, you'll find a world of heritage, opulent architecture, and Rajasthani hospitality. The hotel's awe-inspiring architecture boasts the culture, heritage and traditions of the Pink City. Mesmerising rooms, authentic delicacies and cultural festivities mean there is never a dull moment. For the explorers, some of Jaipur's major attractions are less than 30 minutes from the hotel. This property is also less than 20 minutes from Jaipur Airport (JAI) and approximately a five-hour drive from Delhi.
offer_address: Diggi House, Shivaji Marg, Sawai Ram Singh Road, C Scheme Jaipur, Rajasthan, India 302004

title: Charming Jaipur Luxury Retreat Driving Distance from Agra & Delhi
description:
For a royal and luxurious escape head to RosÃ© Amer Jaipur, a regal retreat spread over three acres of lush landscape, close to the main attractions of the Pink City. Situated 4.5 hours' drive from Agra and Delhi, this historic villa-turned-charming-retreat offers just six magnificent suites, guaranteeing highly personalised service.

Enjoy your escape with daily breakfast, your choice of daily three-course lunch or dinner, a nightly mocktail or soft drink per person, and complimentary Wi-Fi.

**Travelling with family?** Up to two children (aged 12 years and under) stay free with breakfast. Or upgrade to the Family Suite for more space and full inclusions for two adults and two children (aged 12 years and under).

title: Pink City Luxury near Jaipur Airport with Spa & Infinity Pool
description: A short distance from Jaipur Airport, Crowne Plaza Jaipur Tonk Road, an IHG Hotel is a luxe oasis amid an urban jungle. Savour succulent cuisine at the onsite restaurants, indulge in a revitalising spa treatment or invigorate body and mind at the fitness centre. Take a refreshing plunge into the outdoor pool after exploring the marvellous markets and awe-inspiring architecture that Jaipur has to offer. After a memorable day in the Pink City, retire to a refined room for a good night's sleep.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Jaipur Tonk Road, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Tonk Rd, Sitapura Industrial Area, Sitapura, Jaipur, Rajasthan 302022, India

title: Jaipur Palace Glamour with Four Exquisite Restaurants near Heritage Sites
description: India's 'Pink City' is a beacon for the discerning traveller and there's no better way to experience the city's curiosities than with a stay at the ultra-lavish Leela Palace Jaipur. Expect over three hectares of lush, manicured gardens, four exquisite dining venues and bars (try the bespoke cocktails at Jharokha Bar), and a palatial spa for indulgent treatments and wellness rituals. When you're ready to venture beyond the resort walls, discover a delightful location near Jaipur's ancient and iconic sights: The Amber Palace, Hawa Mahal and the City Palace are all within a 30-minute drive.
offer_address: Jaipur-Delhi Highway, NH 11, Kukas, Jaipur 302028, Rajasthan, India

title: Jaipur Opulent Palace Retreat with Rooftop Infinity Pool, Onsite Spa & Three Restaurants
description:
Immerse yourself in the regal splendour of Jaipur with a stay at this palatial haven. Nestled near the forts and cultural treasures of the Pink City, this majestic retreat features opulent suites with private balconies and a personalised butler service. Indulge in the serenity of the Raffles Spa, where aromatic treatments and mineral pools restore balance, or unwind in the sparkling rooftop infinity pool. 

Savour elevated dining and reimagined North Indian cuisine at Arkaa, sip fine wine at the elegant The Writers Bar or delight in tea-time delicacies at the vibrant Safir Tea & Champagne Lounge. Step beyond the hotel to discover vibrant bazaars, ancient palaces and tranquil landmarks like Jal Mahal. This is Jaipur as youâ€™ve never experienced it before.
offer_address: Khasara No 2060, 2061 2267, Kukas Amer, Jaipur 302028, India

title: Jaipur Oberoi Opulence with Maharaja-Inspired Gardens & Lavish Spa
description: Here, in the heart of the Pink City, the legendary spirit of Rajasthani hospitality lives on. Spread over more than a hundred thousand square metres of meticulous gardens, torch-lit walkways and reflective pools - with a centuries-old, restored temple to Shiva at its centre - The Oberoi Rajvilas, Jaipur offers a true taste of Maharaja majesty. Spend your days lounging by the hotel's magnificent pools or head to The Oberoi Spa for treatments to nourish the body and spirit.
offer_address: Babaji Ka Modh, Goner Rd, Prem Nagar, Jaipur, Rajasthan 302031, India

title: Five-Star Jaipur Opulence near Jal Mahal with Tranquil Pool & Serene Spa
description: Surrender to the charms of the 'Pink City' of Rajasthan with a serene stay at this opulent property, overlooking the placid Mansagar Lake and enveloped by the Aravalli Ranges. Boasting ornate Rajasthani decor and blending regal excellence with modern luxuries, this five-star sanctuary is conveniently located near the architectural marvels of Jal Mahal and Amber Fort. Sample authentic Rajput flavours at Jal Mahal restaurant, relax with a drink at the Mansagar Bar, lounge by the pool or rejuvenate with treatments at the Trident Spa.
offer_address: Amber Fort Road, Opposite Jal Mahal, Jaipur, Rajasthan, 302002, India

title: Heritage Jaipur Palace Opulence with Art Deco-Style Swimming Pool
description: Be transported to 19th-century resplendance at Rajmahal Palace RAAS Jaipur, once the palace of maharajas and the chosen accommodaton for Queen Elizabeth II upon her visit to the Pink City. Indulge with world-class facilities, including three eclectic dining spaces, a stunning outdoor pool and boutique courtyard. Away from the resort, Jaipur is yours to explore - stroll through bustling bazaars, taste delectable Rajasthani cuisine and peruse the majestic Amber Fort, a UNESCO World Heritage site.
offer_address: Sardar Patel Marg, Shivaji Nagar, Jaipur, Rajasthan 302001, India

title: Central Jaipur Escape with Rooftop Swimming Pool
description: Spend time in the colourful city of Jaipur with Holiday Inn Jaipur City Centre, an IHG Hotel as your base for exploration. When you're not getting delightfully lost in the vivid pink streets, spend time splashing about in the rooftop swimming pool that offers spectcular panoramas of the city. Choose from three onsite dining venues during your stay, enjoying a hearty breakfast at Monarch, an authentic Indian-style lunch at Chao or cocktails and light bites at RoadHouse Bar & Grill.
location_description: Holiday Inn Jaipur City Centre, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Commercial Plot No 1, Jaipur, Rajasthan, 302 001 India
